data: Button component to render button or link

data.play-online#Play Online: If you just want to play around with NEXT UI without setting up a project, you can use one of our online sandboxes:
data.automatic-installation#Automatic Install:
Using the CLI is the easiest way to start a NEXT UI project. You can initialize your project directly via the CLI:
npx @next-design-labs/next-ui-cli@latest create
data.manual-installation#Manual Installation: If you prefer not to use the CLI, follow these steps to manually set up NEXT UI in your project:
data.install-packages#Install packages:
To use NEXT UI in your project, run the following command:
react and react-dom are peer dependencies and must be included in your project.
npm install @next-design-labs/next-ui-core @mui/base

data: NEXT UI is an open source UI library from NEXT Design Labs designed to streamline the development of high-quality digital products.With the NEXT Design System as its foundation,  it offers a range of reusable components that ensure consistent design and provides developers with essential tools to speed up their development process and create products more efficiently.
